text: For the purposes of this chapter, the term:
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 19-115.

1973 Ed., § 19-115.

Effect of Amendments

D.C. Law 16-79 rewrote section which had read as follows:

"For purposes of this chapter 'Probate Court' means the Superior Court of the District of Columbia."

Legislative History of Laws

For Law 16-79, see notes following § 19-101.02.

DC CODE § 19-115

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: "Domestic partner" shall have the same meaning as provided in § 32- 701(3).
"Domestic partnership" shall have the same meaning as provided in § 32- 701(4).
"Probate Court" means the Superior Court of the District of Columbia.

chapter.text: Rights of Surviving Spouse or Domestic Partner, and Children.
